title: 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Wood Floors, Granite Counters, W&D, 2 mins to HWY 400
posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'Located in North Atlanta, Veridian at Sandy Springs will elevate your life to new levels of luxury.', 'Choose from a variety of one bedroom or two bedroom Atlanta apartments that are carefully arranged in a fantastic pet-friendly community and feature first-class amenities.', 'You will look forward to coming home and enjoying a North Atlanta, GA apartment with your very own fireplace, and appreciate the convenience of our state-of-the-art fitness center to use at your leisure.', 'Our community boasts excellent features including lighted tennis courts and a gorgeously crafted swimming pool, all within close proximity to public transportation.', 'With easy access to the GA-9, and a location right next door to the Northridge Shopping Center, residents of our pet-friendly Sandy Springs apartments are never far from the best shopping, dining and entertainment in North Atlanta, GA.', 'Schedule a tour of our luxury community today—don’t miss out on all that our apartments in Sandy Springs, GA have to offer you.', 'Amenities:', '-Resident Lounge and Cyber Cafe', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Private Balconies', '-Newly Renovated Interiors', '-Controlled Access Entry', '-On-site Clothes Care Facility', '-24 Hour Strength and Cardio Center', '-Poolside Grilling Area', '-Dining Rooms with Breakfast Bars', '-Puppy Park', '-Washer and Dryer Included', '-Lighted Tennis Courts', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
